executive_summary: Yitzchak Meirovich brings precisely what SysAid needs at this pivotal moment: proven experience building Customer Academy infrastructure from scratch, combined with the technical depth to translate complex SaaS concepts into engaging learning experiences. His track record at AllCloud demonstrates the complete lifecycle—from LMS implementation (Cloud Academy serving 200+ users) to certification framework design (achieving 90%+ pass rates) to revenue generation ($1M+ within 18 months).
